website_summaries.verdict: Adorable and cuddly way for kids to enjoy Paw Patrol toys without breaking your budget. This version of Chase is soft enough to double as a pillow.
pros: Sports cute detailing, including Chase's police uniform
Great size for hugging, and lovable for boys and girls of various ages
cons: Rare reports of receiving smaller sizes than advertised

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Would reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Not sure who posted about Walmart packaging... but my chase came in a bag, with a tag on his ear, wnd slightly larger then i anticipated- and the backpack looks true to size when compared to the photo. It smells like a new toy (no odors at all- litterally off the shelf) more then pleased with my purchase! My 2 year old loves him! I am not %100 sure if stock changes- maybe... but as of 8-10-17 not a single complaint! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these big and soft! They are true to size and the photo I'm sharing doesn't do them justice. I would have taken them out of the bags, but I'm giving them to my kids for Christmas. They will be so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Domenica

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a hole in the hat big enough to fit a finger through where it had poor stitching. Bought as a Christmas gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I wasn't sure if it'd be one of the big ones or small ones. Wound up being one of the big ones at over a foot tall at the tallest point. Came in a sealed plastic bag. Noticed a hole in the hat big enough to fit a finger through where it had poor stitching. Bought as a Christmas gift for my nephew and figured "he's 3, he will either destroy it or forget it even exists in a day or two".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased my 4 year old absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid since he received doesn't sleep without hugging it everynight. it's big , of very good quality , for the price is a great bargain, ordered another one "Zuma" for my other older boy, but turned out way smaller ( size of ur hand palm) , stick to this and for others suggest you check size so you know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: She couldn't contain how happy she was
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Chase, so when I saw this, I had to get it. The look on her face when she saw it was priceless. She couldn't contain how happy she was. It's soft, but firm like others have mentioned. Feels pretty well made, but it's only been a couple of weeks since we got it, so we'll see how well it holds up to my 4 year old. She sleeps with it every night and never lets it out of her sight. A must have for your little Paw Patrol fan.
customer_reviews.author: Howie Dub

customer_reviews.title: I was worried after I read some reviews saying it was too small BUT I’m glad I didn’t listen
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a gift. I was worried after I read some reviews saying it was too small BUT I’m glad I didn’t listen, it’s a perfect size and I’m thinking of ordering one for my son now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Made well. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. My son loves to cuddle and kiss his chase pillow. Ive even used it when he wants me to lay next to him. Never looks like ive been laying on it. Holds its shape.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth matheson

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We drove everywhere looking for this for my son. His cousin had one and he wouldn't put it down. We couldn't find it in any store besides Toys R Us and it was $20. This is a well made stuffed animal and it's larger just like his cousins. My son isn't a fan of stuffed animals but he loves his Chase dog :)
customer_reviews.author: s.smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old absolutely loves this Chase. He sleeps with it every single night. It’s large and great quality. I would highly recommend this product for kids who love Chase and want a larger plush toy to cuddle with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: Awwww. my little nephew loved having a dog toy. He had so much fun with this when he got it. Adorable. It came packed well, and on time which was great for me since it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Another Smith

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old son loves this. The head is definitely bigger than the body. Toy is plush and so far looks to be well made. Product came exactlybas pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large stuffed animal. My step son absolutely loved it! I was very pleased by this purchase. Also seems very sturdy and like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RobynAlexis12

customer_reviews.title: Large, soft and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Large, almost 16 inches tall from foot to top of cap. My grandson loved it. Very lightweight and soft, pillow-like. Does stand on it's own. Nicely made and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THis Paws Patrol pillow is great. Bought him for my 2yr old granddaughter for ...
customer_reviews.text: THis Paws Patrol pillow is great. Bought him for my 2yr old granddaughter for Christmas. He' s soft, and looks just like Chase! Pleasantly surprised, he's a good size- at least 14" tall. The only down side is I paid $11 (well worth it) but now he is only $8. If you have Paws Patrol fans in you family don't hesitate to get him. Adorable
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my son
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my son. It's nice and soft. Nicely made. It's as large as my 5 month old son, so cute.
customer_reviews.author: ruby valeros

customer_reviews.title: Loved these cuddle pillows but larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved these cuddle pillows but larger than expected. We didn’t pay attention to dimensions stated on site. Glad we only bought a couple for his bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Good sized, very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well put together and sturdy, washes up well. I thought this would not be cuddly and soft but it is what my 3 year old wraps himself up with most every night and feels protected by! Love it...
customer_reviews.author: AKW

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Fella for your Little Fella
customer_reviews.text: Santa Clause brought this for my son on Christmas. He loves it and carries it around every where he goes. I have to make sure he doesn't forget and leave it some where. It's getting kind of dirty, but he's put together well.
customer_reviews.author: Nxactly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's little brother. He will love it. It's a good size and very soft. Can't wait to give it to him.
customer_reviews.author: adfreeman59

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely adores this plush! Its the perfect size for him to snuggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick. Got this for my 5 yr old son for Christmas. The head is a little wobbly but it’s still a great product. Happy with my purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Drenning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then expected, well made and big hit with grandkids.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves Paw Patrol and I know he's gonna love this toy
customer_reviews.text: This is precious. My grandson loves Paw Patrol and I know he's gonna love this toy!
customer_reviews.author: gammie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It is a good size "pillow". Perfect gift for a paw paw patrol fan. This one may be a couple of dollars more but the quality is way better than the one found in walmart.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it! And that's what its all about. Very well made and so very, very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: big hit with our 4 year old grandson! He likes everything Paw Patrol.

customer_reviews.text: Got this for my paw patrol loving 3 year old. He sleeps with it every night. Its very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Big and cuddly for snuggling. Three of my grandchildren love and carry these around (ages 1 1/2 to 3 1/2). Good price and loved gift.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and a great size
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Nice size and plush stuffie. I bought this instead of build a bear for way less

customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Is a little too heavy. But my 1 1/2 year old absolutely loves it! It’s def bigger than I thought it’d be!

customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pillow. It's a good size perfect for cuddling and good quality material and stuffing.

customer_reviews.text: Cute little guy. What I received was just like the picture in the ad.

customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it when he got it for his birthday. Soft enough for him to play with and its a really good size for little kids.

customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves Paw Patrol, and he loves this cuddle pillow. It's made well and has withstood any damage a 3 year old can dole out. Cute and cuddly.

customer_reviews.text: Super cute Chase stuffed animal! He is big and snuggly, super durable and very high quality. This guy will make it to college with my Little Man (currently 3 years old)!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Chase. He would sleep with a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Chase. He would sleep with a 1.5" plastic version which was impossible to find. This one replaced it and removed the pain of every nap or bedtime.

customer_reviews.title: i loved this i ordered it and it was huge i ...
customer_reviews.text: i loved this i ordered it and it was huge i thought it was going to be little my son was sooo happy for hannukuh

customer_reviews.title: Chase is cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Chase is soft to cradle little heads and he is the perfect size for little arms to give him big hugs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Much bigger than I thought! I was so excited! Not as excited as my 4 y/o though!!

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and wonderful size
customer_reviews.text: This was a great size! So surprised! It is the size of a build a bear for half the cost. My son loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels exactly like the one that sells at Target for $20

customer_reviews.title: Newborn Mans best friend
customer_reviews.text: My best friend had a kid and I wanted to make sure the kid had a stuffed friend, so I got him this. The parents are happy and thanked me for it. I think the kid likes it too. The dog is BIG compared to the newborn, but he will grow into it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Web Shopping Guy

customer_reviews.title: He snuggles with it like it's a stuff animal and does not use as ...
customer_reviews.text: Only gave four stars cause I feel it should be advertised as a stuff animal rather than a pillow. I really do not see how it would work as a pillow. My two year nephew who loves Paw Patrol loves this and sleeps with it every night. He snuggles with it like it's a stuff animal and does not use as a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emeraldcat2

customer_reviews.title: My son says the face looks funny, the smaller plush is better
customer_reviews.text: My son says the face looks funny, the smaller plush is better. If you look at it, the face resembles a bat
customer_reviews.author: Rex Le

customer_reviews.title: While this is nice and with great size
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old absolutely loves Paw Patrol! So I bought him the T-shirt, books, travelling case, in addition to this. While this is nice and with great size, it cannot stand, because the head is too big and the neck cannot support it.... So it topples over, that's my only con regarding this purchase.. so impossible to stand like in the photo display.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy grandma
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. My grandson loved it! All the store's in my area were sold out. Came almost overnight!

customer_reviews.text: My baby boy loves this! He carries it with him every where. When we are in the car, he buckles him on also, so that Chase is safe! Lol!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not a pillow but cute and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I give the 4 stars only because it says pillow. There is no way to use it as a pillow. It just doesn't work. Other than that it is cute and my daughter loves it. I do think it is a little overpriced for what it is. Most definitely not a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Schainholtz

customer_reviews.title: My 3year old Great Grandson just loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 3year old Great Grandson just loved it. As soon as he unwrapped it he ran to his room and put it on his bed.

product_meta.title: Paw Patrol Cuddle Pillow, Chase
product_meta.description: Your favorite paw patroller, marshall is ready for cuddle time and more. 100% polyester plush pillow with authentic applique and embroidered details. Great for tv time, reading time or just to help decorate your toddlers paw patrol room.
feature_bullets: Enhance your Paw Patrol Room Decor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
